game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken, fragments of eternity have scattered across the land. Players take on the role of a Timekeeper, tasked with reassembling these shards to restore balance to the world.
game.beginning: The game begins in the town of Brindlemark, where the player discovers they are the chosen Timekeeper. A mysterious stranger approaches them, revealing that the world is unraveling and only they can stop it.
game.ending: With the shards gathered, the Timekeeper returns to the Heart of Eternity, a mystical realm where time itself was born. There, they must solve the final puzzle and reweave the fabric of time before it's too late.
